page.title: 08MY MORNINGS - ALISON MOORE
page.content:
My usual mornings are very busy. Mum wakes me up at a quarter to eight, but before I get up I have a little relax in bed. I get up slowly and get dressed.
It doesn't take me long before I'm downstairs having breakfast. I have cereal, usually 'Sultana Bran' or 'Weetabix'. I only have cooked breakfast on Saturdays. Then, if I've got time, I watch the breakfast television. Afterwards I go upstairs and wash.
Then Mum and I go and get the bikes out. If it rains I phone Alison Stannard and she gives me a lift to school. I'm always a bit early - before 9. We go in and see who's in and who's not.
